description: Base schema for donors or strains.
comment: Human donors and model organism strains derive from this base object.
title: Donor

___external_ids.description: External identifiers that uniquely identify the donor of the sample, e.g. for strains it might be a strain identifier at a repository or a de-identified donor ID for a person.
___external_ids.comment: List of identifiers that are used by external resources that can be used to identify samples from that particular donor or strain.
___external_ids.title: Unique external identifier(s) of strain or donor

items.description: External identifier that uniquely identify the donor of the sample, e.g. for strains it might be a strain identifier at a repository or a de-identified donor ID for a person.

___schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

___alternate_accessions.description: Accessions previously assigned to objects that have been merged with this object.
___alternate_accessions.comment: Do not submit. Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.
___alternate_accessions.title: Alternate accessions

items.description: An accession previously assigned to an object that has been merged with this object.
items.comment: Only accessions of objects that have status equal replaced will work here.
items.title: Alternate accession
